meanings.definition: A sudden loud noise as of something breaking or hitting another object.
meanings.sent1: The crash of thunder startled the children.
meanings.sent2: The crash of the dishes falling to the floor echoed through the house.
meanings.sent3: The crash of the door slamming shut made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: The crash of the waves against the rocks was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The crash of the falling tree branch was deafening.

meanings.definition: A sudden and violent collision between vehicles.
meanings.sent1: The crash between the two cars caused a traffic jam.
meanings.sent2: The crash on the highway resulted in injuries.
meanings.sent3: The crash of the toy cars was a loud playtime surprise.
meanings.sent4: The crash of the bumper cars at the fair was thrilling.
meanings.sent5: The crash of the race cars at the finish line was intense.

meanings.definition: To break violently and noisily into pieces.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally crashed the glass vase while cleaning.
meanings.sent2: The waves crashed against the shore, eroding the cliffs.
meanings.sent3: The wrestler crashed through the table during the match.
meanings.sent4: The meteor crashed into the earth, causing a crater.
meanings.sent5: The hammer crashed down on the nail, securing it in place.

meanings.definition: To fall asleep suddenly and unintentionally.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, I crashed on the couch and dozed off.
meanings.sent2: During the movie, she crashed in her seat, missing the ending.
meanings.sent3: He crashed during the boring lecture and snored loudly.
meanings.sent4: The tired student crashed on the desk, drooling on the notes.
meanings.sent5: She crashed on her bed after the exhausting workout, sleeping soundly.

meanings.definition: To move with force and speed.
meanings.sent1: The waves crashed against the rocks with great power.
meanings.sent2: The skateboarder crashed down the ramp with skill.
meanings.sent3: The car crashed through the barrier, narrowly avoiding a collision.
meanings.sent4: The athlete crashed through the finish line, winning the race.
meanings.sent5: The wind crashed through the trees, rustling the leaves.
